text:
London, UK | Investec (https://www.investec.co.uk) | Fintech | Junior Developer | Full Time | Onsite | Contract or Perm

Join us in creating fintech products to help businesses grow.

We're using C# and .NET Core 2.0 on the backend and React, TypeScript and MobX on the frontend.

If you love programming and would like an entertaining job with smart and friendly colleagues, lots to learn and a wide variety of challenges, please get in touch. You can email me personally at jamie.mccrindle@investec.co.uk.

We canâ€™t sponsor visas, unfortunately.
